title: France panorama. [No. 72/40]
creator_credit: Societe d'informations Cinematographiques and Pathé Frères
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. Flashes: Albert Marquet - retrospect of painter Albert Marquet; Chess - where the chessboards and sets for the world championship match were made. 2. Youth and space - the young science students’ clubs launch their rockets. 3. Academician Jean-Jacques Gauthier - Jean-Jacques Gauthier, journalist, critic, and novelist, succeeds Louis Armand in the French Academy. 4. Autumn at Versailles - the famous gardens of Le Notre and the Great Fountains.
